subject: Fashion
title: Modern Slavery in Supply Chains
description: A quick, practical guide to Modern Slavery in Supply Chains.

hook.text: More people are in forced labor today than at any point in historyâ€”over 50 million worldwide.

buildup.text: Fashion is one of the top industries linked to modern slavery, especially in spinning and raw materials.

discovery.text: Workers are trapped by debt bondage: recruiters charge fees that take years of low wages to repay.

twist.text: Brands often don't know. Supply chains run 5-7 layers deep, and slavery hides in the lowest tiers.

climax.text: Transparency laws now require brands to report on slavery risk, but few face real penalties for failure.

punchline.text: Modern slavery isn't history. It's stitched into supply chains.

quiz.question: How do workers become trapped in modern slavery within fashion supply chains?
